about_info: You are cordially invited to witness the union of our beautiful farm friends Marley and Pepper! Our first strain to be bred outside of our little farmstead in España, and instead in our new home in the US by Nico in NorCal. Using Seed Junky’s legendary Wedding Cake cut crossed to Double Grape to make our F1 selections
genetics: North America for some time now, but finding a cut we were completely happy with had become a bit of a running gag at the farm; the ‘Wedding Cake treatment’ become a synonym for nitpicking or splitting hairs
awards: , but we weren’t quite done yet, we wanted to add an extra bit of Meph confetti to the white wedding
aroma_flavour: Very dank, funky chemical and gas with a hint of grape. Sweet vanilla, like grape Victoria sponge on the exhale.
medicinal_effect: Great for aching joints and insomnia.

about_info: Sound the sirens—War Pigs is a battle-ready fusion of Old School Mango Haze x 505 Headbanger, delivering a riot of tropical fruit, classic haze spice, and sour funk. Ripe mango, overripe pineapple, and citrus zest hit first, followed by earthy haze and sharp diesel undertones creeping in like a slow-building storm. Lik

Outcrossing a second time with our cut of Krome ‘The White’ for 5 generations, she’s a fine-tuned, more indicia-leaning strain than our Original Walter White and closer to her photoperiod parent. about_info: “Violet, you’re turning violet!” — and this strain leans all the way in. A stinky purple knockout with a nose like funky gym socks and a punch like a bedtime hammer, Violet’s Crinkle is all gas, skunk, and sedation. Dense, frosty buds with deep purples and a full-bodied couch-lock hit make this one a heavy, dreamy smok

Sweet baked goods aromas, with some added savoury cheese notes, like a fresh, out-of-the-oven gassy cheese flan. Expect a plant that can stretch, but lacks some internodal space, so crank those fans and make sure your airflow is on point.

about_info: Do we even need to sell this one to you? Trip Dub O'z, a cross between MephistO'z and Treble Grape (Double Grape x Grape Crinkle), delivers a potent punch with a rich, grape-forward aroma. This strain offers dense, trichome-covered buds and a powerful high that’s perfect for those who enjoy a fruity twist.

about_info: Star of the lineup? I think it’s likely. Expect a full-frontal fruit salad assault on your taste buds and a lively high that settles right into couchlock goodness.

Toof Fairy is a cross of two of our heavy hitting, indica-leaning Original strains. Both initially developed in the early days at the farm, Toof Decay and Ripley’s OG helped put Mephisto Genetics on the map. Two classic photoperiods made automatic, both strains have been mainstays in our ever-changing catalogue over th

about_info: A tall drink of madness at 52–57", The Razzmatazz grows like she’s on stage; hazy, lanky, and impossible to wrangle. She throws out explosive branching and needs constant attention to stay in line. But tame her chaos, and you’ll be rewarded: over 574 grams dry has been pulled from a single run, and she was absolutely d

If you want a cerebral strain to get shit done with, this is your pick. Uplifting, energetic and creative, with lots of classic haze traits and spicey, gassy notes. We expect some added size to Pigletta and oceans of frost packed on every single inch of plant.

about_info: Tennessee Honeymoon is a sultry slow-burner, equal parts dessert cart and garage funk. Some phenos leaned hard into the decadent: fresh-baked blueberry muffins, vanilla glaze, and punch bowl sweetness. Others brought the dank: rubbery chem with a sour twist and a whisper of berries underneath. On the grind, it’s pure o

A supremely sedative smoke, with a terp profile you won’t quite believe. Remaining squat, expect lots of leaf tucking and defoliation earlier than you might usually to keep air flowering through and to allow some light to get through to all the budsites she’s guaranteed to be covered in.

Tiny but turbocharged, Tangfasticz brings a citrus explosion in a pint-sized package. With tangy creamsicle terps and rock-hard colas, this fast finisher delivers dense nugs packed with frosty attitude and zesty aroma. Compact, no-fuss, and sharp as a citrus slap—perfect for flavor chasers with tight grow spaces.

Swirly Birdie Sundae Thumper x Ravenberry Sundae Thumper's creamy, dessert-like qualities swirl with Ravenberry's jammy fuel in Swirly Birdie. This strain is a delectable treat, offering a whirlwind of creamy, sweet, and tangy flavours.
